td.p: A 200-gram block is released from rest at a height of 25 cm on a frictionless 30Â° incline. It slides down the incline and then along a frictionless surface until it collides elastically with an 800-gram block at rest 1.4 meters from the bottom of the incline. See the figure.
What is the velocity of the large block after the collision?

problem.p: How do you classify this problem in your mind? Write a word or short phrase in each box below. Please put the response with the greatest descriptive power to you in the top box.

stringresponse.answer: It's a survey. There is no right answer!
